file.name: spec.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
x-snyk-api-stability: experimental
info:
  title: api
  version: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: /api/api
    description: Api API
paths:
  /things:
    get:
      description: List some things
      operationId: listThings
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Returns a list of things
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: { $ref: '../../common.yaml#/schemas/ThingCollectionResponse' }

Error: parse: paths: /things: get: operation "listThings": responses: 200: content: "application/json": schema: parse schema: reference "../../common.yaml#/schemas/ThingCollectionResponse": resolve reference "../../common.yaml#/schemas/ThingCollectionResponse": invalid schema reference "../../common.yaml#/schemas/ThingCollectionResponse"
